label: Overview
introduction: Data Commons is an open-source platform aggregating global public data for easy exploration using natural language.

items.title: Large harmonized public dataset
items.description: 240 billion data points across 260K statistical variables, harmonized from governmental, inter-governmental, academic and non-profit organizations

items.title: Natural language interface
items.description: Data Commons uses AI for natural language queries, making public data accessible and useful to all

items.title: Tailor your own Data Commons
items.description: Launch your own Data Commons and customize it with your own data to better engage your specific audience

items.title: Explore your data with natural language
items.description: Ask questions in your own words and get answers directly from your data

items.title: Actionable Insights
items.description: Gain actionable insights from your data in connection to global data

items.title: Partners
items.description: Featured organizations who organizations have tailored their own Data Commons to meet their specific needs and goals

label: Tools
introduction: Explore a variety of tools to visualize, analyze, and interact with the Data Commons knowledge graph and its extensive datasets.

items.title: Knowledge Graph
items.description: Explore what data is available and understand the graph structure

items.title: Statistical Variable Explorer
items.description: Explore statistical variable details including metadata and observations

items.title: Data Download Tool
items.description: Download data for selected statistical variables

items.title: Map Explorer
items.description: Study how a selected statistical variable can vary across geographic regions

items.title: Scatter Plot Explorer
items.description: Visualize the correlation between two statistical variables

items.title: Timelines Explorer
items.description: See trends over time for selected statistical variables

label: Documentation
introduction: Access in-depth tutorials, guides, and API references to unlock the full potential of Data Commons and integrate it into your projects.

items.title: Docs
items.description: Learn how to leverage the Data Commons unified database with comprehensive documentation, tutorials, and guides.

items.title: API
items.description: Access a unified knowledge graph with standardized data from diverse sources using Data Commons APIs.

items.title: Tutorials
items.description: Get familiar with the Data Commons Knowledge Graph and APIs using analysis examples in Google Colab notebooks written in Python.

items.title: Contributions
items.description: Become part of Data Commons by contributing data, tools, educational materials, or sharing your analysis and insights. Collaborate and help expand the knowledge graph!

label: About
introduction: Data Commons is an initiative from Google. Discover how Data Commons is changing data analysis. Explore diverse data, learn to use its tools through Python examples, and stay updated on the latest news and research.

items.title: Why Data Commons
items.description: Discover why Data Commons is revolutionizing data access and analysis. Learn how its unified knowledge graph empowers you to explore diverse, standardized data.

items.title: Data Sources
items.description: Get familiar with the Data Commons Knowledge Graph and APIs using analysis examples in Google Colab notebooks written in Python.

items.title: FAQ
items.description: Find quick answers to common questions about Data Commons, its usage, data sources, and available resources.

items.title: Blog
items.description: Stay up-to-date with the latest news, updates, and insights from the Data Commons team. Explore new features, research, and educational content related to the project.
